      public Polygon​(GameObject holder, Vector2 center, float width, float height, float speed, ID id, java.util.List<Vector2> points)
      Polygon.
      Parameters:
      holder - - object holding this shape
      center - - center position (x,y)
      width - - width of the polygon (bounding box)
      height - - height of the polygon (bounding box)
      speed - the speed
      id - the id
      points - - the vertices for the polygon
